item.title: Python and R Examples
item.description: Intro Python and R are both programming languages that are extremely useful for data wrangling and analysis, especially in the realm of computational biology and bioinformatics. Some examples of this can be seen below. R and Python I will be starting in R by assigning the follow string of characters to TheHard. library(reticulate) TheHard = "Chloe x Halle's album Ungodly Hour" Next, I will be switching to python, and save a different string of characters as Truth.
